title: 15rp Off Rename :P
body: Hey there community, i was just curious if there is anyway i can get an extra 15RP to afford a name change due to the fact that i really don't like my IGN (In Game Name). i received $10 worth of RP from a friend of recent, and hit '1285' RP, in which a name change cost '1300'. if there is someway i can accumulate that extra bit of RP i would really like to know. Thanks you guys in Advance!!

replies.body: You can buy a name-change with IP. Just play the game enough and you'll eventually be able to afford it.

abit late for me to post here but you can send a ticket to riot showing how much RP you need and what you want. Draw a picture with paint or something...it dosen't need to be good but i think they should be able to give you 15 RP
Thanks man, ill give it a shot!
Say, how did it go? Did you get the RP?
